data.eml:eml: Italian marine Gastrotricha: VI. Seven new species of Macrodasyida

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hummon, William D., Todaro, Antonio (2009): Italian marine Gastrotricha: VI. Seven new species of Macrodasyida. Zootaxa 2278: 47-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.191139
